metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12823 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenConnect 8.09 has a buffer overflow, causing a denial of service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact, via crafted certificate data to get_cert_name in gnutls.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12823` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 8.10-1
openconnect - 8.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.10-1').
